original_text: but he is under guardians and managers until the date set by his father.
korean_text: 그 아버지가 정한 때까지 후견인과 청지기 아래에 있나니

sentences.original_text: but he is under guardians and managers
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 후견인과 관리인 아래 있습니다

sentences.original_text: until the date set by his father
